trans-unit.source: How to Set Up Shipping Agents | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: How to Set Up Shipping Agents | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can set up a code for each of your shipping agents and enter information about them.

seg-source.mrk: You can set up a code for each of your shipping agents and enter information about them.

target.mrk: Můžete nastavit kód pro každého z vašich přepravců a zadat o nich informace.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Shipping Agents

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Shipping Agents

trans-unit.source: You can set up a code for each of your shipping agents and enter information about them.

seg-source.mrk: You can set up a code for each of your shipping agents and enter information about them.

target.mrk: Můžete nastavit kód pro každého z vašich přepravců a zadat o nich informace.

trans-unit.source: If you enter an Internet address for the shipping agent, and the agent provides package tracking services on the Internet, you can use the automatic package tracking feature.

seg-source.mrk: If you enter an Internet address for the shipping agent, and the agent provides package tracking services on the Internet, you can use the automatic package tracking feature.

target.mrk: Pokud pro přepravce zadáte internetovou adresu a přepravce poskytuje služby sledování zásilek na internetu, můžete použít funkci automatického sledování zásilek.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Track Packages](sales-how-track-packages.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Track Packages](sales-how-track-packages.md).

trans-unit.source: When you set up shipping agents on your sales orders, you can also specify the services that each shipping agent offers.

seg-source.mrk: When you set up shipping agents on your sales orders, you can also specify the services that each shipping agent offers.

target.mrk: Při nastavování přepravců na prodejních objednávkách můžete také určit služby, které každý přepravce nabízí.

trans-unit.source: For each shipping agent, you can set up an unlimited number of services, and you can specify a shipping time for each service.

seg-source.mrk: For each shipping agent, you can set up an unlimited number of services, and you can specify a shipping time for each service.

target.mrk: Pro každého přepravce můžete nastavit neomezený počet služeb a pro každou službu můžete zadat dobu dodávky.

trans-unit.source: When you have assigned a shipping agent service to a sales order line, the shipping time of the service will be included in the order promising calculation, for that line.

seg-source.mrk: When you have assigned a shipping agent service to a sales order line, the shipping time of the service will be included in the order promising calculation, for that line.

target.mrk: Po přiřazení služby přepravce k řádku prodejní objednávky bude doba dodávky služby zahrnuta do výpočtu příslibu vyřízení objednávky pro tento řádek.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Calculate Order Promising Dates](sales-how-to-calculate-order-promising-dates.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Calculate Order Promising Dates](sales-how-to-calculate-order-promising-dates.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Vypočítejte data příslibu vyřízení objednávky](sales-how-to-calculate-order-promising-dates.md).

trans-unit.source: To set up a shipping agent

seg-source.mrk: To set up a shipping agent

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Shipping Agents**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Shipping Agents**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Hledat stránku nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Hledat stránku nebo sestavu"), zadejte **Přepravci** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields as necessary.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [tooltip-inline-tip](includes/tooltip-inline-tip_md.md)].
Choose the **Shipping Agent Services** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Shipping Agent Services** action.

trans-unit.source: In the **Shipping Agent Services**, fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Shipping Agent Services**, fill in the fields as necessary.

target.mrk: V **Služby přepravce**, vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: If you delete the shipping agent on the order line, the shipping agent service code is also deleted.

seg-source.mrk: If you delete the shipping agent on the order line, the shipping agent service code is also deleted.

target.mrk: Pokud na řádku objednávky odstraníte přepravce, odstraní se také kód služby přepravce.

trans-unit.source: The contents of fields that were based in part on the shipping agent service are recalculated.

seg-source.mrk: The contents of fields that were based in part on the shipping agent service are recalculated.

target.mrk: Obsah polí, která byla částečně založena na službě přepravce, se přepočítá.
